sourcesContent: import{jsx as r,jsxs as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";import i from"@heroicons/react/24/outline/ExclamationTriangleIcon";import{styled as o}from"styled-components";import{Checkbox as a}from"../../components/Checkbox.mjs";import{Pill as n}from"../../components/Pill.mjs";const t=({variant:i,setPreventMaliciousTransaction:o,preventMaliciousTransaction:t})=>"warn"===i?/*#__PURE__*/r(n,{variant:i,children:/*#__PURE__*/e("div",{className:"flex flex-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/r(l,{variant:i}),/*#__PURE__*/e("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/r("b",{children:"Warning: Suspicious transaction"}),/*#__PURE__*/r("br",{}),"This has been flagged as a potentially deceptive request. Approving could put your assets or funds at risk."]})]})}):"error"===i?/*#__PURE__*/r(n,{variant:i,children:/*#__PURE__*/e("div",{className:"flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/e("div",{className:"flex flex-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/r(l,{variant:i}),/*#__PURE__*/e("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/r("b",{children:"This is a malicious transaction"}),/*#__PURE__*/r("br",{}),"This transaction transfers tokens to a known malicious address. Proceeding may result in the loss of valuable assets."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/e("div",{className:"mt-3 flex flex-row gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/r(a,{color:"var(--privy-color-error)",checked:!t,readOnly:!0,onClick:()=>o(!t)}),/*#__PURE__*/r("p",{children:"I understand and want to proceed anyways."})]})]})}):void 0;let l=/*#__PURE__*/o(i).withConfig({displayName:"StyledExclamationTriangleIcon",componentId:"sc-e6305f32-0"})(["width:20px;height:20px;stroke-width:2px;flex-shrink:0;display:inline-block;margin-right:8px;",";"],(r=>"error"===r.variant?"color: var(--privy-color-error)":"color: var(--privy-color-warn)"));export{t as TransactionValidation};
